msg_ui_option_01_info:
You can choose from different text-scrolling
speeds to control how quickly messages appear.
msg_ui_option_03_info:
You can choose whether you wish to see move
animations during battles or not.
msg_ui_option_04_info:
You can choose if you want to switch Pokémon
after an opponent faints or not.
msg_ui_option_05_info:
You can choose to have Pokémon automatically
sent to your Boxes or not when your party is full.
msg_option_10_01: Would you like to save these settings?
msg_ui_option_07_info:
You can choose to have your game saved
automatically or not.
msg_ui_option_09_info:
If you turn on this option, cutscenes that play
during game events will be skipped.
msg_ui_option_10_info: You can adjust the volume of background music.
msg_ui_option_11_info: You can adjust the volume of sound effects.
msg_ui_option_12_info: You can adjust the volume of Pokémon cries.
msg_ui_option_13_info:
Would you like to reset the settings to
their defaults?
msg_ui_option_select_01: Would you like to save these settings?
msg_ui_option_select_03:
Would you like to reset all the settings to
their defaults?
msg_ui_option_15_info:
You can choose regular or inverted for vertical
camera controls.
msg_ui_option_16_info:
You can choose regular or inverted for horizontal
camera controls.
msg_ui_option_17_info:
You can select if you want to show your
Pokémon’s nicknames during Link Battles.
msg_ui_option_18_info:
You can choose whether to be prompted to give
a nickname to a Pokémon when you obtain it.
msg_ui_option_skip_01:
Attention!\c
If you choose to skip cutscenes, some cutscenes
that are key to the story will also be skipped.\c
Please select this option only after you have
finished the main story once.\c
Are you sure you want to skip cutscenes?
msg_ui_option_19_info:
You can choose not to be prompted to teach
Pokémon new moves as soon as they level up.
msg_ui_option_21_info:
You can choose to enable or disable your
controller’s rumble feature for this game.
msg_ui_option_22_info:
You can choose whether helping functions will be
activated when you fall from a great height.
